1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Abu Samh said:"I used to serve the Prophet, and when he wanted to take a bath he would say: 'Turn your back to me.' So I would turn my back and hung up a cloth, and concealed him with it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِسْتِتَارِ عِنْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about being concealed when bathing
